titleStmt.title: Some account of the Province of Pennsilvania in America lately granted under the great seal of England to William Penn &c. : together with priviledges and powers necessary to the well-governing thereof : made publick for the information of such as are, or may be disposed to transport themselves, or servants into those parts.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by Benjamin Clark,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
